original_text: The avenger of blood shall himself put the murderer to death; when he meets him, he shall put him to death.
korean_text: 피를 보복하는 자는 그 살인한 자를 자신이 죽일 것이니 그를 만나면 죽일 것이요

sentences.original_text: The avenger of blood shall himself put the murderer to death
sentences.korean_translation: 피의 보복자가 친히 살인자를 죽일 것이다

sentences.original_text: he shall put him to death
